QuestData.Title: Reflections in Amber
QuestData.Description:
<A viscous dark ooze drips from this large chunk of amber. Attempting to wipe it off is futile, as the ooze is seemingly created by the amber itself.
As you hold it, unintelligible whispers fill the back of your mind.
The Shado-Pan will surely want to examine it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Ooze-Covered Amber to the Shado-Pan at the Serpent's Spine.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Ooze-Covered Amber to the Shado-Pan at the Serpent's Spine.
